title: Legal Documents | IC Markets
meta: IC Markets is required to identify the person before opening his trading account
legal_documents_2: Legal documents – All relevant legal documentation required for managing and understanding your legal relationship with IC Markets can be found here.
legal_documents_14: We're here 24hrs a day Monday to Sunday.
legal_documents_24: In accordance with the Australian Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Counter-Terrorism Financial Act 2006 IC Markets requires you to provide certain documents to identify you before opening your trading account. Please ensure that you have read and understood our
legal_documents_26: which outlines our requirements prior to completing your online account application.
legal_documents_28: If at any stage you wish to lodge a dispute with IC Markets, please refer to our
legal_documents_31: To ensure compliance with ASIC regulatory guide 227 all Australian applicants must complete a suitability test. The test is designed to test your knowledge of Forex and CFDs. In order to pass the test a pass mark of 70% or 7 out of 10 must be achieved.
legal_documents_33: IC Markets may collect personal information from you from time to time. Our
legal_documents_35: details how we handle your personal information.
legal_documents_40: Prior to opening a trading account with IC Markets please ensure that you have read and understood our Account Terms and other disclosure documents as applicable.
legal_documents_43_2: Wholesale Client Information Statement (Wholesale clients only)
legal_documents_46: When you trade in products offered by IC Markets, you have a counterparty risk with IC Markets. Counterparty Hedging Policy outlines how we manage our exposure to market risk from client positions.
